name: .DMTEMPLATE File Extension
summary: Learn about .DMTEMPLATE files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Email template used by Direct Mail, an email marketing program used for sending advertisements; stores the graphics, layout, and text for an email; used for producing professional looking emails.

content: Several templates are included with the Direct Mail installation.
